query:
SELECT ba.abbreviation, ba.fullName, COUNT(br.id) as req_count 
FROM badge_abbreviations ba 
LEFT JOIN badge_requirements br ON ba.fullName = br.badgeName 
WHERE ba.abbreviation IN ('SS', 'PTZ', 'CHL', 'SSS', 'LR')
GROUP BY ba.abbreviation, ba.fullName
ORDER BY ba.abbreviation
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user waCuRew5RKYFFjj.root --database DS68jwRuNTWiz9tNrw6KXW --execute SELECT ba.abbreviation, ba.fullName, COUNT(br.id) as req_count 
FROM badge_abbreviations ba 
LEFT JOIN badge_requirements br ON ba.fullName = br.badgeName 
WHERE ba.abbreviation IN ('SS', 'PTZ', 'CHL', 'SSS', 'LR')
GROUP BY ba.abbreviation, ba.fullName
ORDER BY ba.abbreviation
